column5: Thank you for accepting me into the group......................We're going up to St. Jacobs in a few days and just wondering where would be a good place for some shore fishing in the area...............Thanking you in  advance for any comments..................................Have a great day.................................
I don't think there's a lot of fishing opportunities at this time of year.. especially with the low water levels
If memory serves me, the Grand River is in that area.  We used to fish it over fifty years ago in the summer and caught the odd fish....
